results.title: Does the Same Hyperlactatemia Cut-Off in the Context of Acute Diseases Hold the Same Meaning in Diabetes Mellitus?

results.title: Irrespective of the degree of hyperlactatemia, similar lactate levels were associated with a lower mortality rate in metformin users compared with non-users: beware of confounders!
results.text_hl: Irrespective of the degree of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlactatemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065906 @@@hyperlactatemia@@@, similar @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@lactate@@@ levels were associated with a lower mortality rate in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users compared with non-users: beware of confounders!
